heading: This Afternoon
text: Sunny north, mostly to partly in the south. Highs in the mid 70s to lower 80s. South to southwest 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Some high clouds in the south. Mostly clear from the Adirondacks and Route 2 northward, with patchy valley fog. Lows mainly in the mid to upper 50s, around 50 in the cold spots north. Winds becoming north around 10 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Patchy valley fog early, then partly to mostly. Valley highs in the mid to upper 70s southeast, low to mid 70s elsewhere south; mid 60s to lower 70s north. North winds 10 to 15 mph, occasionally gusting to 25 mph.
